ivardefs.name: identifier
ivardefs.desc: The locally assigned unique identification by the software. For example: handle ID.

ivardefs.name: languageCode
ivardefs.desc: The language code for the human-readable text string produced by the device. This language code will follow the IETF language tag. Example: en-US.

ivardefs.name: lastSystemChange
ivardefs.desc: The timestamp for the most recent system change which includes device configuration or setting change.

ivardefs.name: measurementPrinciple
ivardefs.desc: The physical principle of the measurement. For example: thermal, chemical, acoustical, etc.

ivardefs.name: operationalStatus_
ivardefs.desc: The current operational status of the device. For example: On, Off, Standby, etc.

ivardefs.name: parameterGroup
ivardefs.desc: The parameter group supported by the current device component that is based on some nomenclature, e.g. cardiovascular.

ivardefs.name: parent
ivardefs.desc: The link to the parent resource. For example: Channel is linked to its VMD parent.

ivardefs.name: productionSpecification_
ivardefs.desc: The production specification such as component revision, serial number, etc.

ivardefs.name: source
ivardefs.desc: The link to the source Device that contains administrative device information such as manufacture, serial number, etc.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: The component type as defined in the object-oriented or metric nomenclature partition.
